title: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis
description: This is a randomized open-label, active-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in patients with Multiple Sclerosis. The study will enroll approximately 357 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 18-78 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Multiple Sclerosis
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
